control-tag.name: googleProperties
control-tag.description: Properties relating to the Google Search Control.

attribute.name: googleKey
attribute.description: Key provided when you register with Google, required to use their Web Services.

attribute.name: maxResults
attribute.description: Number of results desired per query. The maximum value per query is 10, the minimum is 1.

attribute.name: filter
attribute.description: Activates or deactivates automatic results filtering, which hides very similar results and results that all come from the same Web host. Filtering tends to improve the end user experience on Google, but for your application you may prefer to turn it off

attribute.name: restrict
attribute.description: Restricts the search to a subset of the Google Web index, such as a country like "Ukraine" or a topic like "Linux." . See Control documentation for details.

attribute.name: safeSearch
attribute.description: A Boolean value which enables filtering of adult content in the search results.

attribute.name: languageRestrict
attribute.description: Restricts the search to documents within one or more languages. See Control documentation for details.
